nodes.text: Dybbron III was a planet in the third orbital position of its star system that was occupied by a breakaway faction of the Galactic Empire following the Imperial defeat at the Battle of Endor. The world was attacked by the loyalist 204th Imperial Fighter Wing in its renewed Operation: Cinder campaign that targeted Imperial breakaway remnants. The fighter wing recruited a number of personnel from Dybbron, including Heirorius and Starzha, and additonally recovered a pirate gunship from the planet's evidence yards.
Dybbron III appeared in flashbacks in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, the last instalment of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy which was written by Alexander Freed.
